data.name: NARAKA BLADEPOINT - Asura DLC
data.detailed_description:
ASURA DLC


About the Game

Upgrade your game to earn ASURA rewards


The ASURA DLC contains:

- [Summit1g] Telmuch Special Outfit; Headwear & Emote

- [Lirik] Tianhai Special Outfit; Headwear & Emote

- [Shroud] Tarka Ji Special Outfit; Headwear & Emote
data.about_the_game:
Upgrade your game to earn ASURA rewards


The ASURA DLC contains:

- [Summit1g] Telmuch Special Outfit; Headwear & Emote

- [Lirik] Tianhai Special Outfit; Headwear & Emote

- [Shroud] Tarka Ji Special Outfit; Headwear & Emote
data.short_description: Experience the Unchained Multiplayer Combat with NARAKA: BLADEPOINT ASURA DLC, including Shroud&Summit1g&Lirik exclusive outfits, headwears and emotes.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 4th generation or AMD FX 6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750TI or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: a) Can run at 720p/60fps; b) We advise you install the game on an SSD for a more streamlined experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 7th generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6G or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: a) Can run at 1080p/60fps; b) We advise you install the game on an SSD for a more streamlined experience.
